title: Harry Potter All House Crest Cotton Tank Top Pajama Short Set by Intimo
features: FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Our Pajamas are made with high quality yarns that will keep you child warm, cozy and relaxed when they go to sleep. We specialized in character Kids, Toddler, Infant and Baby sleepwear for all ages! Our pull on bottoms include no-pinch elastic waistband and our tops feature heat-sealed tags.

ABOUT THE BRAND: If you love Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger and all things wizarding then you will love our Pajamas! Did the sorting hat put you in Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw or Hufflepuff? We have pajamas for all Hogwarts houses!

Perfect for a Christmas Gift or Holiday present! Make every night before bed a Hogwarts Slumber Party! Your child can dress up for Halloween or any day of the week in these Costume Pajamas and perform magic!

CARE INSTRUCTIONS & MORE: Machine Wash. Imported. All our pajamas are compliant with all legal and safety guidelines and requirements for Tight Fit (Cotton Pajamas) or Flame Resistant FR Testing (Polyester Poly Pajamas). Sizing on tight fit garments are within tolerance of the CPSC guidelines and are designed to be a snug fit. Please review the size chart if you have questions and order your pajamas accordingly!
OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT: All our Harry Potter Pajamas are officially licensed and approved with the consent and permission of Warner Brother Studios.
description: Sorted into gryffindor don't head off to hogwarts without this 2 piece gryffindor house crest cotton tank top pajama short set. The pajama set is made from 100 percent cotton rib fabric and is designed to be tight fitting. It features the gryffindor crest on the tank top and matching striped shorts in the gryffindor house colors. A magical pajama set for your brave and daring gryffindor wizard
